definitions: A pioneering American company in the video game industry, founded in 1972.
A brand of home video game consoles and arcade games produced by the company Atari.
Any of several early video game consoles, especially the Atari 2600.
examples: Many remember playing games on their Atari.
Atari was a major player in the early days of video gaming.
He still has his original Atari console.
